items.name: Espresso
items.description: A strong and concentrated coffee shot.

items.name: Americano
items.description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a milder taste.

items.name: French Press
items.description: Brewed with a French press for a rich and full-bodied flavor.

items.name: Pour Over
items.description: Freshly brewed coffee made to order with a pour-over method.

items.name: Turkish Coffee
items.description: A traditional coffee brewed with finely ground coffee beans and cardamom.

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk and foam, topped with cocoa.

items.name: Latte
items.description: Espresso with a lot of steamed milk, creamy and smooth.

items.name: Mocha
items.description: Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk, a sweet treat.

items.name: Flat White
items.description: Espresso with velvety microfoam, a popular Australian coffee.

items.name: Vienna Coffee
items.description: Black coffee topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

items.name: Iced Coffee
items.description: Chilled coffee served over ice, perfect for a hot day.

items.name: Caramel Macchiato
items.description: Espresso with caramel, steamed milk, and foam.

items.name: Affogato
items.description: A scoop of vanilla gelato 'drowned' in a shot of hot espresso.

items.name: Irish Coffee
items.description: Hot coffee with Irish whiskey, sugar, and cream.

items.name: Honey Vanilla Latte
items.description: Latte with honey and a hint of vanilla, a delightful sweetness.
